name: Theon EPPS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Epps v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Theon EPPS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December, 2010, the above captioned appeal is hereby quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
8 A.3d 1264
Theon EPPS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 29 EAP 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 3, 2010.
